questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I see myself as a successful businesswoman in 10 years. I will be running a thriving international company, travelling the world, and making a positive impact on people's lives. I will also be married with children, balancing my career and family life. I am excited for this future!
